reviews.review:
雖然很想給這個垃圾bug遊戲負評，但造型太香了我還是給好評
實在是不建議沒朋友的人買來玩，人類單排跟鬼遊戲體驗都不怎麼好
Love this game and nearly everything about it.
Não Comprem essa merda! jogo lixo
i was doing a gen and there myers was just standing there menacingly it scared me so much 10/10

Terrible game. I have no joy whatsoever in it but i still play it. Customs is fun when you have bad people playing with you. It is not a fun game. I have wasted 300 hours of my life on this and over 100 dollars. Do not buy unless you hate yourself inside

Match making past rank 20 is slow, the AI in the training as both killer and survivor are terrible and don't reflect human movement, I have been getting disconnection penalties for being disconnected from host, I have recently gotten blocked from matchmaking for 15 minutes for the killer disconnecting, the items in the store cost too much, and it doesn't have a practice mode so you can't play the game for awhile if you were playing a trial then get disconnected. The closest you get is the tutorial, which doesn't allow any different characters or customization. I would only recommend this game to someone who has four or more friends whom all have $20 to burn individually, not counting the amount they'd have to spend to get access to most of the killers. Either that or they farm for a month, which by then, the game would become unfun. Also there are characters you can ONLY spend money on. Also, toxic survivors.

I have a good 4.9K hours between PC and PS4. This game consumes you, enrages you, scares you, and causes you to stroke out.   But, the laughs make up for it.  To say I wouldn't recommend this to friends, is a lie.  Good luck in the fog, lmao.
It's a game you get around sometimes. A few quick matches then leave.
This games mad fire if you into horror and things like that. It has a very welcoming and strong community, between players and the devs. Definitely worth the buy.
心中有党  成绩理想
Pretty straight forward, some challenges and definitely creepy!

Okay So it has been quite a while since i have made my last review and lot has changed in the game.
The gameplay has been improved alot with the recent perk changes making chases less frustrating for killers.
Survivors can't be tunneled out of the hook since BT is basic kit now.
BHVR finally took action and decided to change the meta quite drastically
The Grinding has been greatly reduced with the new updated since getting any killler or surv to lvl 50 unlocks all of their teachables to every other unit that you have.
Haddonfield got reworked ! finally!!!!! 

To sum it all up things finally seem to be taking a turn for the better.

Demasiadas dlc XD 

Edit: se actualizaron los precios de las dlc hoy en mi pais, cuestan el equivalente a 1000 dolares, ahora mi reseña posee mucho mas sentido 

nuevo edit: arreglaron el error del precio de las dlc, sin embargo el precio si subio y ahora estan con sobreprecio asi que si tienes dinero y no estas dispuesto a sufrir la curva de aprendisaje del juego y los bugs no esta mal para jugar de ves en cuando

PD: olviden todo lo anterior acabo de jugar 7 partidas seguidas con facecampers la gente era menos toxica en el lol

игра говна поела но мне нравится. ведь я ГОВНОЕД. ну а так реально если бы разрабы нерфили или бафали а не гробили персонажей то было бы заебись. половина манов сосут у парочки просто потому что так создали но сурвы которые умеют играть всёравно трахнут любого пиздюка на мане.
Muuito bom e divertido da pra jogar por varias horas.Recomendo

This game community is such a toxic swamp that i bet even shrek wouldn't be able to live in it.
The developers ignore obvious balance issues for years,the balance itself is almost non existent 
Optimization sucks donkeys ass,its terrible and require tweaks in settings.ini to enable fullscreen mode otherwise you're stuck in borderless window 
Matchmaking is terrible
But despite all that this games manages to deliver something unique in terms of gameplay
Asymmetric gameplay offers interesting posibilities for thoose who likes playing in teams and thoose who can't stand being matchmade with a bunch of randoms 
It also requires skill and the feeling when you outplay someone is a bliss
I recommend buying this game if you don't mind having toxic waste shower every now and then,also being tiltproof helps in getting more enjoyment 
Also don't use Keys or NOED try to be a decent being)

Игра просто супер! Когда ты в неё играешь ты испытываешь огромное количество эмоций. От страха пока ты чинишь генератор, потому что в любой момент к тебе может подкрасться маньяк. До дикого ликования когда ты сбежал. Всем советую!
Genialna gierka na zrelaksowanie się po ciężkim dniu
Nice game, just a bit broken sometimes

I do not recommend this game, the bad game play is the worse with the tunneling, slugging & camping, devs saying they fix things when really they fixed nothing. Killers are just sweaty as all hell for those bloodpoints or they just full up trolling you to make you de-pip. If you have TTV in your name you will be trolled and/or stream sniped so if your gonna stream this game, be ready for a tunnel game. Reporting players does nothing, Devs don't read or don't even bother doing anything about reports unless someone finds a glinch in a map that is making it hard for a killer to get to you. The ranking system is just flat out broken, you could do so much in a match and still de-pip for it if the killers does not chase or see you the whole match even through it says in the end that you can get BP for hiding from the killer which is not true.
Che juego injusto más lleno de bugs que el propio ubisoft pero bueno, así es el cyberpunk 2077, dbd es una belleza con bug macabros
Too many unfair perks or unfair matchmaking, besides that its a enjoiable game but its too often the case that the killer wont let you do anything which totally ruins the game for me

Das Spiel Macht als Killer Sehr viel Spaß doch als Survivor ist dies eher Schwierig da das Spiel im Modus Survivor macht viel Mehr Spaß mit Freunden als alleine da das Spiel sehr auf Komunikation ausgelegt ist
love this game! i love how you have the option to be a killer or a survivor. you have tons of different option/characters and tons of upgrades.

Super fun game to play, either alone or with friends! Objectives are pretty clear for either the survivor or killer role, so it's not too hard to pick up. It is a horror game, after all, so you may get a few good scares in if you're playing survivor. But overall, it has become one of my favorite games to play!

- Ещё постоянные баги, ошибки и безразличие разрабов к своему творению просто настое****нели...


А если серьезно, то мне, как новому игроку, отыграв чуть более 40 часов, очень трудно давать какие-либо оценки. Вообще мне игра понравилась, за 5 лет её существования так никто и не смог добиться подобного успеха, как DbD. Я честно о ней узнал только из-за выхода DLC Resident Evil и собственно вот - подсел. Сразу вспомнил огромное количество персонажей из фильмов ужасов, которые когда-то смотрел с удовольствием, прям ностальгия пробрала. На этой волне некоторые фильмы даже пересмотрел. При всём при этом за 5 лет игра практически никак не развивается, хочется чего-то нового! Пора бы внедрить в игру какой-нибудь новый режим, на мой скромный взгляд, игра в нём нуждается капитально. Я мало играю в онлайн игры, но нигде ещё не видел подобного количества багов и ошибок. Дело дошло до смешного - я просто не мог элементарно пройти обучение, потому-что он было сломано, приходилось всему учиться непосредственно в публичных матчах. Сейчас обучение уже починили и обновили, хотя бы какие-то телодвижения от разработчиков, но этого мало. Исходя из выше написанного я не могу рекомендовать игру к покупке, а жаль.
Was soll man zu dem Müll noch sagen? Killer werden absolut OP gemacht und Surv Perks verlieren immer mehr an nutzen.
don't buy this game it  fucking sucks but I'm to far in to stop don't make the same mistake
recomiendo mucho este juego es muy bueno jugar solo o con amigos
pretty damn fun tbh. some toxic dudes but its worth it when u really get into the game

this game is a great game to play with friends, it is super fast paced, takes lots of skill, and gets your heart racing. i really recommend this to anyone who wants a fun game that is worth the buy. if you like horror this game is 100% for you. in my opinion, 10/10.
